{{velocity}} #* Main webhome -----------
This sheet presents all the spaces that a user can access. This includes his own personal space and all of the spaces linked to the group he is in.
Author: Jean SIMARD (jean.simard@xwiki.com) *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqUserId = $request.getParameter('ENT_USERID'))
## GLOBAL VARIABLES #set($user = $services.eesc.getUser($reqUserId)) #set($groupsForUser = $services.eesc.getGroupsForUser($reqUserId))
############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($user.getId() && !$xwiki.exists("xwiki:XWiki.$user.getId()")) #createUser($user) #end #if(!$groupsForUser.isEmpty()) #displayMenu() #else #displayErrorNoGroup() #end #end
############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Create a user. * ----- * * Create a new user by creating the page, adding XWikiUsers and XWikiRights objects then adding the user to XWikiAllGroup. * * @param $user EESC user of the user to create *# #macro(createUser, $user) #set($userDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($userPage)) #set($userObj = $userDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiUsers', true)) #set($userObj = $userDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiRights', true)) #set($discard = $userDoc.save()) #addUserToGroup($user, 'XWikiAllGroup') #if($user.getStatus() == 'STUDENT') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTStudents') #elseif($user.getStatus() == 'TEACHER') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTTeachers') #elseif($user.getStatus() == 'STAFF') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTStaffs') #elseif($user.getStatus() == 'PARENT') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTParents') #elseif($user.getStatus() == 'LOCAL_ADMIN') #addUserToGroup($user, 'XWikiAdminGroup') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTLocalAdmins') #elseif($user.getStatus() == 'GUEST') #addUserToGroup($user, 'ENTGuests') #end #end
#* * Add user to a group * ----- * * Add a user to a XWiki group. * * @param $userId EESC user to insert in the group * @param $groupName Group where to insert the user *# #macro(addUserToGroup, $user, $groupName) #set($userPage = 'xwiki:XWiki.' + $user.getId()) #set($groupsDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("XWiki.$groupName")) #set($groupObj = $groupsDoc.newObject('XWiki.XWikiGroups')) #set($discard = $groupObj.set('member', $userPage)) #set($discard = $groupsDoc.save()) #end
############################################## ## VIEW ############################################## #macro(displayMenu) {{menu type="vertical collapsible"}} * [[image:icon:house Accueil>>xwiki:Main.WebHome]] * ---- #set($queryString = 'is_user=true') #set($userName = $user.getName()) * [[image:icon:user Espace de ${escapetool.xml($userName)}>>xwiki:EESCCode.CSRedirect||queryString="$queryString"]] #set($userWikiName = 'u' + $user.getId()) #if($services.wiki.exists($userWikiName)) #set($userTaskManagerWebHome = $userWikiName + ':Tasks.WebHome') * [[image:icon:calendar Gestionnaire de projets>>$userTaskManagerWebHome]] #end * ---- #foreach($group in $groupsForUser) #set($groupId = $group.getId()) #set($groupName = $group.getName()) #set($queryString = 'is_user=false&groupid=' + $groupId) * [[image:icon:group Espace ${escapetool.xml($groupName)}>>xwiki:EESCCode.CSRedirect||queryString="$queryString"]] #end {{/menu}} #end
#macro(displayErrorNoGroup) {{error}}Vous n'êtes inscrit à aucun groupe.{{/error}} #end {{/velocity}}
